Description: Switch to retrieve the tutorial data set instead of the full data set.
Restrict console outputs to all infos, warning or errors only
Directory into which results are written.
European countries defined by their `Two-letter country codes (ISO 3166-1) <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2>`_ which should be included in the energy system model.
Switch to retrieve current HVDC projects from `Wikipedia <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_HVDC_projects>`_
Switch to build cutouts via the rule :mod:`build_cutout` or whether to retrieve the data from zenodo with :mod:`retrieve_cutout`.
Switch to create raster ``natura.tiff`` via the rule :mod:`build_natura_raster` or whether to retrieve ``natura.tiff`` from zenodo with :mod:`retrieve_natura_raster`.
